cpw.mods.fml.common

Class EnhancedRuntimeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • cpw.mods.fml.common.EnhancedRuntimeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomModLoadingErrorDisplayException, LoaderException, MissingModsException

    public abstract class EnhancedRuntimeException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    RuntimeException that gives subclasses the simple opportunity to write extra data when printing the stack trace. Mainly a helper class as printsStackTrace has multiple signatures.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
